Class BlockNodeSyncing

java.lang.Object
com.kneelawk.graphlib.syncing.lns.api.graph.user.BlockNodeSyncing
public final class BlockNodeSyncing extends Object
Holds a block node encoder and decoder.

  • Method Details

    • encode

      public void encode(@NotNull @NotNull BlockNode node, @NotNull @NotNull alexiil.mc.lib.net.NetByteBuf buf, @NotNull @NotNull alexiil.mc.lib.net.IMsgWriteCtx ctx)
      Encodes a block node.

      Note: this does not write the block node's type id. That must be written separately.

      Note: the block node being encoded must be of the type that the encoder expects.

      Parameters:
      node - the block node to encode.
      buf - the buffer to encode to.
      ctx - the message context.

    • decode

      @NotNull public @NotNull BlockNode decode(@NotNull @NotNull alexiil.mc.lib.net.NetByteBuf buf, @NotNull @NotNull alexiil.mc.lib.net.IMsgReadCtx ctx) throws alexiil.mc.lib.net.InvalidInputDataException
      Decodes a block node.
      Parameters:
      buf - the buffer to decode from.
      ctx - the message context.
      Returns:
      a newly decoded block node.
      Throws:
      alexiil.mc.lib.net.InvalidInputDataException - if the buffer contained invalid data.
